team.operation_notes: Built a strong onboarding, implementation, and customer success motion to support rapid clinic launches. Made key engineering hires and are shipping faster. Laid foundational systems for scale (rev ops, product instrumentation).

product_updates.description: Built a strong onboarding, implementation, and customer success motion to support rapid clinic launches
product_updates.impact: Supports rapid clinic launches and scale

product_updates.description: Laid foundational systems to support scale, including rev ops and product instrumentation

events.description: Completed Y Combinator, closed $550K ARR across 21 clinics in 9 weeks

notes: 21 clinics sold for $550K ARR, 6 churned worth $77,654 ARR (churn due to poor fit). Targeting $2.8MM ARR and adding $600K of new ARR/month. Seeking healthtech software advisors. Company focuses on dental, building vertical AI for 'medical-lite' practices, with goal of automating practices to be run with zero support staff.
